attributes.action: CLOSE ALL SHOPS TILL NOON ON 11TH NOVEMBER 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This year on 11th November will see the 90th Anniversary of the signing of the Armistice which brought to end end WW1.

I would like to petition parliament for all shops to close till noon on that day as a mark of respect.

This happens in Australia and New Zealand on ANZAC Day.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
